About

Hi.. I’m Federico Fazzi (known eurialo on the web), beer/coffee addicted and highly active on research about security things, I live in Sardinia and I’m currently working at Sanvil S.r.l. as a Penetration Tester.

Linux, Security and Bitcoin enthusiast, in free time hacktivist and security researcher, in this blog I'll publish my findings and more about coding! If you need to contact me, mail me directly at eurialo@ (please use GPG Key for a private Encrypted message) or social network.

If interested, this is the online version of my curriculum-vitae

Deftcode(2)

This is a static website run via Jekyll, a blog-aware, static site generator written in Ruby. If you like this responsive theme that I’ve made, you can find out sources in Github at deftcode.ninja. All contents in this website are licensed under the terms of the MIT License.
